name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior System Engineer with 9+ years of dynamic experience in cloud services, automation, and container orchestration. Proficient in managing and deploying applications using **VMware**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **Ansible**. Strong background in both **Windows** and **Linux** environments, with expertise in **CI/CD** pipelines and **Git** for version control. Skilled at designing and implementing efficient container solutions with **KubeVirt** and **Talos**. Original strengths include a solid foundation in **.NET**, **C#**, and microservices architecture, combined with the ability to collaborate proficiently across teams and lead projects to successful outcomes.
